text: Zvirokwazvo, zvakave zvinodzikiswa kwauri muGwaro (rako raunaro, Qurâ€™aan) kuti kana mukanzwa ndima dzaAllah (dzichiverengwa) dzichirambwa kana kushoropodzwa, musave munogara navo kusvikira vashandura nyaya dzavo; (asi mukagara navo) zvirokwazvo naizvozvo munenge makafanana navo. Zvirokwazvo, Allah vachavaunganidza vanyengedzi vose neavo vasingatendi muGehena
